abstract: The authorized payment information for this transaction.
overview:
## Discussion

This attribute is contained by the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePaySession/onpaymentauthorized] event. Access this attribute using the event parameter in the callback function; for example, `var payinfo = event.payment;`.

[doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPayment]  contains `billingContact` and `shippingContact` if they were requested, and it also contains [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentToken].

# payment

**Instance Property**

The authorized payment information for this transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
readonly attribute ApplePayPayment payment;
```

## Discussion

This attribute is contained by the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePaySession/onpaymentauthorized] event. Access this attribute using the event parameter in the callback function; for example, `var payinfo = event.payment;`.

[doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPayment]  contains `billingContact` and `shippingContact` if they were requested, and it also contains [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentToken].
title: payment
